title: But It SUCKS: Building In Public!
description:
So you've gone through the process, you built your product in public and shown the process and then the launch comes and ...... it SUCKS! What do you do?
Let's chat about going through the ups and downs of building in probably and dealing with the time (it it's coming) when it sucks!

Lets jump in!

Check out the project: https://app.buildinpublic.coach/signup 

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!

#building #technology #ai
